title: Gibson and Walk visual cliff even when coaxed

content.prompt: Researchers used a visual cliff with a glass-covered drop-off to examine behavior in crawling infants. Even when coaxed by their mothers to crawl out onto the glass covering, most infants refused to do so, indicating that they had developed which of the following?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
